description: This file defines a React functional component named 'MetricCard'. It renders a styled card element displaying a metric title, value, optional icon, and accessibility labels. The component is intended for use within a React project to show key metrics with a glassmorphism design.

methods.name: MetricCard({ title, value, accent = 'primary', ariaLabel, icon })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a glassmorphism styled metric card with customizable title, value, icon, accent color, and accessibility label.

ctags.name: MetricCard
ctags.pattern: /^export default function MetricCard({ title, value, accent = 'primary', ariaLabel, icon }) {$/

ctags.name: card glass metric ${accent}
ctags.pattern: /^    <div className={`card glass metric ${accent}`} role="group" aria-label={ariaLabel || title}>$/

fields.name: <div className={`card glass metric ${accent}`} role="group" aria-label={ariaLabel || title}>
